This task is to enjoy your hard-earned #rEntitlements#k! #bCaptain Al#k's mission is for me to use the Entitlement to spend the #rcurrent Rep down to 500#k. He also wanted to make sure I stacked up enough Reps by saving all the way up to 2,000. Better return to Captain Al once I complete the mission.

#rTotal of at least 2,000 Rep
Current Rep under 500#k
(Open the Family window to see both the current Rep and the total Rep)

Captain Al commended my efforts for successfully accomplishing all the missions, and told me I have the looks to become a great Senior. He also reiterated the fact that it's very important to provide a full support to my Juniors and everyone in the Family. I better ask Al if I have any questions about the Family. Time for me to start a big Family of my own!
You are really a brilliant and resourceful explorer. I didn't think you'd be able to pull this off. Are you ready to tackle on the final mission?

Seeing your Rep skyrocket to that level never ceases to surprise me, but the real fun of having a Family isn't the Rep. It's the #bEntitlement#k that only the famous explorers can enjoy! With your level of Rep, it's already available for you...

My last mission to you is to actually use this Entitlement. Using '/' as the center of the Family window, the left shows the current Rep, and the number on the right shows the total Rep. When using the Entitlement, only the current Rep will be used. The total Rep is more for record.

I want you to achieve a #rtotal Rep of 2,000 or above#k, and bring your #rcurrent Rep down to below 500#k. After that, you can come back to me and report the results. Make sure to check your Rep level through the Family window. Best of luck to you!
Please reconsider. You look like you are in great shape to achieve this...
